ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD, Color DSP, Horizontal high resolution 600 TV Lines.
36 pcs IR Infrared LED illuminators for night vision, 100 ft (30m) IR range.
2.8 -12mm varifocal lens with wide view angle, 0 Lux /F1.2 (IR LED on).
Vandal-proof design, Multi-Axis for wall or ceiling mounting, weatherproof.
All in one IR dome security camera with cable. Power supply not included.
